Decreases the floor clipping by the number of map units stored in special2 each call until it is fully ..."
revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_ThrustRaise'''
(''no parameter'')
Decreases the floor clipping by the number of map units stored in special2 each call until it is fully revealed. When revealed, the first argument is set to 1 (raised) and if the second argument (bloody) is non-zero will jump to the BloodThrustInit2 state, otherwise jumps to the ThrustInit2 state. On the first call after being invisible, the {{Class|DirtClump}} created by [[A_ThrustInitDn]] will be destroyed. The function has a 16% chance of spawning dirt particles in the same manner as [[A_WraithRaise]]. Finally, special2 is incremented by one to increase the speed. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|ThrustFloor}} and derived classes.
